DOC.brief_summary: The Child Family Research Partnership ( CFRP ) conduct `` local '' evaluation AVANCE 's Fathers Action/Padres Activos ( FA/PA ) fatherhood program . AVANCE non-profit organization serve low-income family child since founding 1973 . AVANCE site provide fatherhood service time , program offer varied across site rigorous evaluation program complete . Through federally-funded Responsible Fatherhood grant , AVANCE aim create one fatherhood curriculum use across site : Fathers Action/Padres Activos ( FA/PA ) .
